name: StarShip Runner
description:
Starship Runner is an endless runner who's make for the PizzaJam with this theme Movement...

You can only use lateral movement to dodge the blocks and try to go as far as possible...

This game is making with Unreal Engine 4  and its my second game jam, because I'm learning the engine recently...

Do not hesitate to put comments to say what you like or not, so that I improve me on my next projects

Music by Kai Engel - Headway,  Free Music

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A new version is available with corrections and improvements available here :

https://download.tasaka.ovh/Games/StarShip%20Runner%201.1.rar

I did not update it on itchio to leave the game as I made it

PatchNote-V1.1

- Code improvement and optimization
- Fixed a bug that could crash the game during a collision with an mouvement orange cube

- Changing the speed increase +35 instead of +100
- Rename Protect to Shield
- ShieldZone now adds +1 at Shield Count for each passage
- Add sound : "Shield Up" "Speed Up"
- Add random value for zones Speed and Shield
- Fixed a bug bad placement in Tile Corner, there should be more time before having a spawn block
- Add Block Rotation
